title: The Blood Lord Vladimir skin is bugged.
body:
After doing some tests it seems the Blood Lord Vladimir skin's sound files are bugged. Ever since patch 6.10 whenever Vladimir would Q someone you can actually hear his base skins Q sound underneath the Blood Lord sound. This is also apparent with his E which actually plays the sounds from the old Vladimir E. 

Also, on a side note. Ever since the Mage update,  Blood Lord Vladimir's visual particles have also been glitchy. Previously, the veins on his cape would glow red whenever he performed Transfusion and the blood ball he carries around seems to be hollow and overly shiny. I'm not sure if this was intended but it is very unfortunate to lose these effects especially on a legendary skin. 

Riot can you please take a look at this to make sure everything is working properly. Thank you.

replies.body: I've also noticed these things too when i was spectating someone play vladimir. Too bad I don't playy him as much to be as compelled to report the bugs.

Hey Teh DuuuDe! 

Thanks for the report! We can definitely take a look and see what's going on here. :)

**EDIT**: We're looking into the audio stuff, and the visuals are updated that match his (Q).
